S

saveImage() - Method in class customization.DrawingScreen
Saves the frame from the drawing interface as an actual frame to be used in an animation.
Screen - Class in screens
The Screen class initializes the window size to 800 by 500, and any changes to the window after will follow the same scale.
Screen() - Constructor for class screens.Screen
Constructs a screen object.
screens - package screens
 
ScreenSwitcher - Interface in arcoir
The ScreenSwitcher interface initialized each of the four screens to a number between 0 and 3, so that other classes can easily call the switchScreen() method in order to change the display.
Scrollable - Class in game
The Scrollable class shifts the background image either left or right, depending on which direction the character moves in the game.
Scrollable(int, PImage, int, PApplet) - Constructor for class game.Scrollable
Creates a new movable background for the game.
select(String) - Method in class customization.DrawingScreen
Selects a drawing tool to be used.
selectColor(int) - Method in class customization.ColorPalette
Selects a color on the palette.

sets the height of this entity's hitbox to the specified width

setImage(PImage) - Method in class game.Scrollable

setLives(double) - Method in class game.Entity

setMovesXAxis(boolean) - Method in class game.Entity

setSpeed(int) - Method in class game.Scrollable
Initializes the speed of the background to amount passed in the parameter.

spawnEnemy() - Method in class game.GameScreen

switchScreen(int) - Method in class arcoir.DrawingSurface
 
switchScreen(int) - Method in interface arcoir.ScreenSwitcher
Changes the display to one of the fours specific screens passed into the parameter.
